price: Does man not see that We have created him from a sperm-drop, then[22] he becomes a clear adversary,
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن نُّطۡفَةٖ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٞ مُّبِينٞ
footnotes: [22] i.e., as soon as he becomes a self-sufficient being.
